verses.text: \w Then|strong="H5307"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* father’s \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* directed \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w physicians|strong="H7495"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* service \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w embalm|strong="H2590"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* father \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w So|strong="H6680"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w embalmed|strong="H2590"\w* \w him|strong="H6680"\w*,

taking \w the|strong="H3588"\w* forty \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w required|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w complete|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* embalming. \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w mourned|strong="H1058"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H4390"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w mourning|strong="H1068"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w*, \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w court|strong="H1004"\w*, “If \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w*

\w my|strong="H7725"\w* father \w made|strong="H7650"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w when|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* said, ‘\w I|strong="H2009"\w* am \w about|strong="H8033"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w tomb|strong="H6913"\w* \w that|strong="H5927"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w dug|strong="H3738"\w* \w for|strong="H4191"\w* myself \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* land \w of|strong="H6913"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.’ \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* father, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w then|strong="H2009"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* replied, “\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H6547"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w your|strong="H6912"\w* father, \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w he|strong="H7650"\w* \w made|strong="H7650"\w* \w you|strong="H5927"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w do|strong="H7650"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H5927"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* accompanied \w him|strong="H6912"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*—

along \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w*. \w Only|strong="H7535"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w were|strong="H6629"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Goshen|strong="H1657"\w*.

\w Chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w alike|strong="H1571"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w large|strong="H3515"\w* procession.

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w reached|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w threshing|strong="H1637"\w* \w floor|strong="H1637"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Atad, \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w across|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w lamented|strong="H5594"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* wailed \w loudly|strong="H1419"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* Joseph \w mourned|strong="H5594"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* father \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H5676"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mourning \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w threshing|strong="H1637"\w* \w floor|strong="H1637"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Atad, \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* solemn ceremony \w of|strong="H3427"\w* mourning \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w*.” \w Thus|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H1637"\w* \w across|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Abel-mizraim.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* Jacob’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Machpelah|strong="H4375"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w Mamre|strong="H4471"\w*, \w which|strong="H7704"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H5375"\w* \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w purchased|strong="H7069"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ephron|strong="H6085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burial|strong="H6913"\w* site.

\w After|strong="H5927"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s brothers \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* father \w was|strong="H3130"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w What|strong="H7451"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w bears|strong="H7852"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w grudge|strong="H7852"\w*? \w Then|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3130"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w repay|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H1580"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6680"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w sent|strong="H6680"\w* \w word|strong="H3130"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, saying, “\w Before|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w died|strong="H4194"\w*, \w your|strong="H6440"\w* father \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*,

‘\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H7451"\w* \w what|strong="H7451"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beg|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* brothers, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H1580"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7451"\w*.’ \w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* father.” \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* message \w came|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5375"\w*, \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*.

\w His|strong="H6440"\w* brothers \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w bowed|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* said, “\w We|strong="H2009"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w slaves|strong="H5650"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* replied, “Do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3372"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. Am \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* God?

\w As|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w intended|strong="H2803"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, God \w intended|strong="H2803"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w order|strong="H4616"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w accomplish|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w like|strong="H2803"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*—\w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w preserve|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lives|strong="H2421"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* do \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w provide|strong="H3557"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3372"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w little|strong="H2945"\w* \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6258"\w* Joseph reassured \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H3372"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w kindly|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H4714"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* father’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* age \w of|strong="H1004"\w* 110.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* Ephraim’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H8029"\w* \w generation|strong="H8029"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w indeed|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5927"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* said \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H3327"\w* brothers, “\w I|strong="H4480"\w* \w am|strong="H6485"\w* \w about|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w but|strong="H4191"\w* God \w will|strong="H3290"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* land \w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w promised|strong="H7650"\w* \w on|strong="H5927"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Abraham, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w made|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w take|strong="H6485"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “God \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w surely|strong="H6485"\w* \w attend|strong="H6485"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H6485"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H6485"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w carry|strong="H5927"\w* \w my|strong="H5927"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H2088"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* 110. \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w they|strong="H8141"\w* \w embalmed|strong="H2590"\w* \w his|strong="H4191"\w* \w body|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* placed \w it|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* coffin \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.
